attributes.action: Take away MPs rights to vote themselves pay rises
attributes.additional_details: It is an absolute disgrace that elected MPs are telling the public that pay rises should be small in times of austerity, but can vote themselves above inflation pay rises. They have decimated public services pensions yet vote themselves increases on their pensions. This is morally wrong. The pay increases should be governed by the people that vote them into office!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
